name: CrownFall
description: CrownFall is an action game that will give you a thrilling battle experience. Overcome overwhelming bosses one after another; but it will never be easy.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5 3337U Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 270 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4690 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
